languages.text: {n}Трудно сказать, что больше пугает юношу — сестра Арджента или описываемые ею трудности. Однако Мариус вскидывает подбородок и твердо отвечает:{/n} "Я выпью чашу до дна, какой бы горькой она не была, и за каждое испытание вознесу хвалу Императору".

{n}It is hard to tell if Marius is more intimidated by the Sister of Battle or the hardships she speaks of. However, he juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows, no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every trial."
languages.original_text: {n}Трудно сказать, что больше пугает юношу — сестра Арджента или описываемые ею трудности. Однако Мариус вскидывает подбородок и твердо отвечает:{/n} "Я выпью чашу до дна, какой бы горькой она не была, и за каждое испытание вознесу хвалу Императору".

traits.locale_text: {n}Between Sister Argenta and the hardships she spoke of, it's hard to tell which has intimidated the young man more. However, Marius juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every challenge."

{n}Between Sister Argenta and the hardships she spoke of, it's hard to tell which has intimidated the young man more. However, Marius juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every challenge."

{n}It's hard to tell if Marius was more intimidated by Sister Argenta or the hardships she spoke of. However, he juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows, no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every trial."

{n}It's hard to tell if Marius was more intimidated by Sister Argenta or the hardships she spoke of. However, he juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows, no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every trial."

{n}It is hard to tell if Marius is more intimidated by the Sister of Battle or the hardships she speaks of. However, he juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows, no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every trial."

{n}It is hard to tell if Marius is more intimidated by the Sister of Battle or the hardships she speaks of. However, he juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows, no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every trial."

languages.text: {n}Entre la Sœur de Bataille et les épreuves dont elle parle, vous avez du mal à savoir ce qui intimide le plus Marius. Cependant, l'officier redresse fièrement le menton et répond d'une voix assurée :{/n} « Je boirai ma coupe de malheurs, aussi amère qu'elle soit, et je remercierai l'Empereur pour chacune de ces épreuves. »
languages.original_text: {n}It is hard to tell if Marius is more intimidated by the Sister of Battle or the hardships she speaks of. However, he juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows, no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every trial."

traits.locale_text: {n}Entre la Sœur de Bataille et les épreuves dont elle parle, vous avez du mal à savoir ce qui intimide le plus Marius. Cependant, l'officier redresse fièrement le menton et répond d'une voix assurée :{/n} « Je boirai ma coupe de malheurs, aussi amère qu'elle soit, et je remercierai l'Empereur pour chacune de ces épreuves. »

languages.text: {n}Cuesta distinguir si Marius se siente más intimidado por la hermana de batalla que por las penurias que le acaba de describir. Sin embargo, levanta la barbilla y replica con voz firme:{/n} «Beberé de ese cáliz por amargo que sea, y alabaré al Emperador por cada ordalía».
languages.original_text: {n}It is hard to tell if Marius is more intimidated by the Sister of Battle or the hardships she speaks of. However, he juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows, no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every trial."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuesta distinguir si Marius se siente más intimidado por la hermana de batalla que por las penurias que le acaba de describir. Sin embargo, levanta la barbilla y replica con voz firme:{/n} «Beberé de ese cáliz por amargo que sea, y alabaré al Emperador por cada ordalía».

languages.text: {n}马吕斯看起来有些恐慌，你很难判断他是在惧怕阿洁塔，还是在惧怕她描述的艰难困苦。但即便如此，他依然仰起头，以坚定的声音回答道：{/n}“我愿意将我的痛苦之杯一饮而尽，无论它有多么苦涩。每当遇到考验时，我都会赞美帝皇。”
languages.original_text: {n}It is hard to tell if Marius is more intimidated by the Sister of Battle or the hardships she speaks of. However, he juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows, no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every trial."

traits.locale_text: {n}马吕斯看起来有些恐慌，你很难判断他是在惧怕阿洁塔，还是在惧怕她描述的艰难困苦。但即便如此，他依然仰起头，以坚定的声音回答道：{/n}“我愿意将我的痛苦之杯一饮而尽，无论它有多么苦涩。每当遇到考验时，我都会赞美帝皇。”

languages.text: {n}マリウスが戦いのシスターに怯えているのか、彼女が語る苦難に怯えているのかは不明だ。しかし、彼は顎を突き出し、毅然とした声でこう答えた。{/n}「私は悲しみの杯を、それがどんなに苦くても飲み干し、すべての試練に対して皇帝を賛美します」
languages.original_text: {n}It is hard to tell if Marius is more intimidated by the Sister of Battle or the hardships she speaks of. However, he juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows, no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every trial."

traits.locale_text: {n}マリウスが戦いのシスターに怯えているのか、彼女が語る苦難に怯えているのかは不明だ。しかし、彼は顎を突き出し、毅然とした声でこう答えた。{/n}「私は悲しみの杯を、それがどんなに苦くても飲み干し、すべての試練に対して皇帝を賛美します」

languages.text: {n}Es ist schwer zu sagen, ob die Schwester der Schlacht Marius stärker einschüchtert oder die Mühsal, von der sie spricht. Doch er reckt das Kinn und antwortet mit fester Stimme:{/n} "Ich werde meinen Kelch voller Leid austrinken, so bitter es auch schmecken mag, und werde den Imperator für jede neue Prüfung preisen."
languages.original_text: {n}It is hard to tell if Marius is more intimidated by the Sister of Battle or the hardships she speaks of. However, he juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows, no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every trial."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist schwer zu sagen, ob die Schwester der Schlacht Marius stärker einschüchtert oder die Mühsal, von der sie spricht. Doch er reckt das Kinn und antwortet mit fester Stimme:{/n} "Ich werde meinen Kelch voller Leid austrinken, so bitter es auch schmecken mag, und werde den Imperator für jede neue Prüfung preisen."

languages.text: {n}Marius'un Harp Rahibesi'nden mi yoksa onun bahsettiği zorluklardan mı daha çok gözünün korktuğunu söylemek zor. Ancak başını dikleştiriyor ve kararlı bir sesle yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Hüzünlerle dolu kupamdan içeceğim ve tadı ne kadar acı olursa olsun, karşılaştığım her bir zorlukta İmparator'un adını yücelteceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}It is hard to tell if Marius is more intimidated by the Sister of Battle or the hardships she speaks of. However, he juts out his chin and replies in a firm voice,{/n} "I will drink my cup of sorrows, no matter how bitter it may be, and will praise the Emperor for every trial."
